title: Till Death Calls
description: When Emma joins a summer camp, she comes into contact with a group of kids, who unbeknownst to her, are different. Sparks fly between Emma and a fellow camper and a deep longing is ignited. But in order to protect her, the object of her affection needs to stay away from her, but will they be able to accomplish that -- to stay away from each other?
author: Sandra Sparkler
